resources.string: This Add-on MUST be used with “Dolphin Browser” which is available on Google Play.

User styles are themes for web sites. User styles empower your browsing experience by letting you customize web sites. Take out irrelevant content, change colors, or completely redesign the entire site. This addon has the same functions as the Stylish for Firefox and Chrome on a PC.
Trouble with file writing. Try one more time.
